Theme wrapper

The theme wrapper functionality is found in lib/utils.php. This code comes directly from scribu's theme wrapper post.

base.php is used to serve all of the templates for your site. In the theme root, the following files are only used to include files in the templates/ directory, which contains all of the theme templates:

  1. index.php (archive page templates) includes templates/content.php
  2. page.php includes templates/content-page.php
  3. single.php includes templates/content-single.php

The Template Hierarchy is traversed as normal before the wrapper is loaded.
